body_text: Also, the docs for getPrefType doesn't mention it, but the PREF_BOOL return values are constants defined on Services.prefs. So Services.prefs.PREF_BOOL can be used to check if the preference is a boolean, and so forth.
body: Also, the docs for `getPrefType` doesn't mention it, but the `PREF_BOOL` return values are constants defined on `Services.prefs`. So `Services.prefs.PREF_BOOL` can be used to check if the preference is a boolean, and so forth.
body_html: Also, the docs for getPrefType doesn't mention it, but the PREF_BOOL return values are constants defined on Services.prefs. So Services.prefs.PREF_BOOL can be used to check if the preference is a boolean, and so forth.
